I still see no point in this class, it does nothing.
InstanceCountTracker can be used directly.
replies.author: lprimak

timeline.bodyText:
I would move instance count into own class, not have instance counts in different classes.
Minimize changes to WebappClassLoader
Also, this doesn't touch non-webapp (jar, ear etc) class loaders
timeline.author: lprimak
